original_text: Ecolab inc (ECL) Q2 2021 Earnings Call Transcript Ecolab (ECL) Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Mark, Margins Rise Ecolab (ECL) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates Ecolab Second Quarter Reported Diluted Continuing Operations EPS $1.08; Adjusted Diluted Continuing Operations EPS $1.22, +88%
